org.webcurator.core.harvester.util
Class AlertLogger

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.core.harvester.util.AlertLogger

public class AlertLogger
extends java.lang.Object

The AlertLogger is responsible for writing a harvesters alerts to a log file in the directory with the other Heritrix logs. Note: There is a problem with this as Heritrix does not currently identify the Job that generated the alert and there is single alert logger for all the Heritrix instances.

Author:
nwaight
